name: Hoops Puzzler
summary:
Shoot this mechanism hoop game! Help our guy by shooting basketball into the hoop. Each level is challenging and with amazing physics-based puzzle. With real physic machanisms, you have to figure out a way to the hoop in each level through intricate
and challenging puzzles. With lay ups, bounce passing, and another smart shots to score a goal. Drag and adjust direction and power, release your finger to make a shot.
